comments.content:
Without the shadow, the closest match I found was Quimby:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/quimby/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822144341/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/quimby/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/matchandkerosene/quimby/")

With a shadow, the closest match I found was Juneway JNL:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/juneway/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822144341/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/juneway/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/juneway/")
